snippet: The United States department said Iranians were using private exchange houses and trading companies in other countries, masking transactions with fake identities and transferring money informally and often illegally through couriers.
abstract: United States Treasury Department says Iran is finding ways to bypass sanctions that have shut it out of global financial system, calling efforts emerging threat to sanctions' effectiveness.
lead_paragraph: The United States department said Iranians were using private exchange houses and trading companies in other countries, masking transactions with fake identities and transferring money informally and often illegally through couriers.

headline.main: Iran Finding Some Ways to Evade Sanctions, Treasury Department Says
headline.print_headline: Iran: New Efforts to Evade Sanctions

keywords.value: Office of Foreign Assets Control (United States Treasury)
keywords.name: organizations
